CSL::Nodes::Group

The cs:group element may contain one or more rendering elements (not cs:layout). cs:group itself may carry the delimiter attribute (to delimit the enclosed elements) and the attributes for affixes (applied to the group output as a whole), display and formatting (formatting settings are transmitted to the enclosed elements). Note that cs:group implicitly acts as a conditional: cs:group and its child elements are suppressed if a) at least one rendering element in cs:group calls a variable (either directly or via a macro), and b) all variables that are called are empty. This behavior exists to accommodate descriptive cs:text elements. For example

<layout>
  <group prefix="(" suffix=")">
    <text value="Published by: "/>
    <text variable="publisher"/>
  </group>
</layout>

results in “(Published by: Company A)” when the “publisher” variable is set to “Company A”, but doesn’t generate output when the “publisher” variable is empty.

# File lib/csl/nodes.rb, line 1139
def process(data, processor)
  start_observing(data)

  processed = children.map { |child| child.process(data, processor) }.reject(&:empty?).join(delimiter)

  stop_observing(data)

  # if any variable returned nil, skip the entire group
  skip? ? '' : processor.format(processed, attributes)
rescue Exception => e
  handle_processing_error(e, data, processor)        
end

# File lib/csl/nodes.rb, line 1165
def skip?
  @variables && @variables.map(&:last).all?(&:nil?)
end

# File lib/csl/nodes.rb, line 1152
def start_observing(item)
  @variables = []
  item.add_observer(self)
end

# File lib/csl/nodes.rb, line 1157
def stop_observing(item)
  item.delete_observer(self)
end

def update(key, value)
  @variables << [key, value]
end

# File lib/csl/nodes.rb, line 1182
def collect_formatting_attributes(exceptions=[])
  formatting_attributes = {}
  (Nodes.formatting_attributes - exceptions).each do |key|
    formatting_attributes[key] = self[key]
    self.attributes.delete(key)
  end
  formatting_attributes
end
set_defaults() click to toggle source 
# File lib/csl/nodes.rb, line 1172
def set_defaults
  formatting_attributes = collect_formatting_attributes(%{ delimiter suffix prefix })        

  children.each do |child|
    formatting_attributes.each_pair do |key, value|
      child[key] ||= value
    end
  end
end
